primary_post: There are moments in these deportation fights when I can just FEEL how pissed off they are that I’m Puerto Rican 😂 they want to threaten me with it so bad 😂

Young lady...as an old white guy, you two are the reason I still have hope! Bless you and stay strong and safe💗

I love you.
I love you both 💕

I’m Puerto Rican and Mexican and I’m in constant fear. I was born in San Diego my parents are also born in America as were my grandparents. Before them I do not know. Yet I am constantly reminded that I could be next. When I see them target Navajos and green card holders.
Stay strong. We have to do this together and I am one who, if I see anything happening in front of me, will get involved to help.

It’s always a positive to know that people will say something. I just worry that people will become complacent. I currently live in Columbus Ga and I have a lot of maga people everywhere. It scares me. I try not to let it control my life. When all of this started I was scared to step outside.
Georgia is a hard place to be right now I’m sure. I’m in Virginia which is more mixed but we have enough for sure.

Yes all we can do is come together. Hopefully they see how wrong they are. Hopefully they’ll join hands with us. However when your heart is filled with hatred and bigotry all you see is a world full of enemies. You’d rather suffer so others can go without. They feel zero empathy very apathetic.
We got your back AOC. #UNITEANDFIGHT
That's cool and inspiring, but they also have military grade weapons, tanks and drones. People will die.
People already are, and that’s entirely on the fascists.
I’m afraid of what the fascists may do to me for fighting back, but I’m more afraid of what may happen if I don’t resist.

congresswoman you stand tall and strong for your community and for the people that elected you in there you have been threatened yes but you wont back down we need everyone else to follow you and fight back against the evil nazi trump administration enough is enough get it done drag trump out now!!!
AOC please keep fighting millions of Americans are counting on you!
Please check into what they are doing to green card holders right now and how they are being treated at airport ports of entry.
What is happening? I remember last time they were looking through people's phones and social media.
Wait what?????
Yes. The TSA agents were looking through people's phones. I had to go to Europe to visit my Mum as she was sick and I deleted all my social media before I went.
Do you know if they are doing the same to citizens traveling with green card holders?
Give ‘em hell!

But we should remember this isn't silliness or inconsistency. It's racism. They know you're an American, they don't *want* you to be. Fascists want nothing more than to be able to selectively declare citizens "illegal".

You have to be real truthful to yourself right now. This is happening! We are under attack. None of these maneuvers are to benefit Americans, which is the sole purpose for electing a president or leader.
You go, girl. By that I mean YOU STAY, GIRL.

Please, Ms. Cortez, watch your back. They are not just pissed off, they itch to make an example of, what they would love to do to all people of colour... And you are - let's face it - a very big thorn in their paws 👍👍😘 And thank you for that from little Denmark 🇩🇰
They are gd racists. Keep doing you.
You are a woman and you are beautiful and Puerto Rican and you tell the truth. You are their absolute archnemesis.

God bless you and every Puerto Rican with their feet on the soil in the USA, many of whom have been here generations longer than my family. Many more happy years here y’all we love you and need you. 🌳🪺🌊
